user_input: I want you to create a 4 days training split inspired by Marcus Filly
output:
Day 1: Full Body Functional Training
- Warm up: 5-10 minutes of dynamic stretching and mobility
- Squats: 3 sets of 10 reps
- Dumbbell Rows: 3 sets of 12 reps
- Push-ups: 3 sets of 10 reps
- Deadlifts: 3 sets of 8 reps
- Plank: 3 sets of 30 seconds

Day 2: Cardio and Core
- Warm up: 5-10 minutes of light jogging or cycling
- HIIT Workout: 20 minutes of intervals (30 seconds of work, 30 seconds of rest)
- Russian Twists: 3 sets of 20 reps
- Bicycle Crunches: 3 sets of 15 reps
- Leg Raises: 3 sets of 12 reps

Day 3: Upper Body Strength
- Warm up: 5-10 minutes of foam rolling and mobility exercises
- Bench Press: 4 sets of 8 reps
- Pull-ups: 4 sets of 6 reps
- Dumbbell Shoulder Press: 3 sets of 10 reps
- Tricep Dips: 3 sets of 12 reps
- Bicep Curls: 3 sets of 12 reps

Day 4: Lower Body and Mobility
- Warm up: 5-10 minutes of dynamic stretching and foam rolling
- Bulgarian Split Squats: 3 sets of 12 reps each leg
- Romanian Deadlifts: 3 sets of 10 reps
- Box Jumps: 3 sets of 8 reps
- Hip Thrusts: 3 sets of 12 reps
- Mobility drills: 10 minutes of hip, ankle, and shoulder mobility exercises

Remember to listen to your body, adjust the weights and reps as needed, and always focus on proper form to prevent injuries. Stretch and foam roll after each workout to aid in recovery. Make sure to fuel your body with proper nutrition and stay hydrated throughout the day. If you have any health concerns or injuries, consult with a healthcare professional before starting any new fitness program.
